title: Qualify Lead from Webinar
description: Following a marketing webinar, an agent needs to follow up with attendees who showed high engagement (e.g., asked questions).

tasks.description: Get a list of webinar attendees who asked questions or stayed for the entire duration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of high-engagement leads.

tasks.description: Contact one of the leads to ask if they have any further questions and to understand their needs.
Based on the conversation, qualify the lead and schedule a follow-up demo.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully converts a marketing-qualified lead to a sales-qualified lead.
